messages.title: Focus on the Economy & Debt
messages.content: Mike Simpson writes about the massive government debt, the banking crisis, and describes it as 'The government's personal credit card bill'. Proposes a way out which ensures fairness and sustainable growth by tackling government debt without choking off economic recovery.

messages.title: Confidential Help with Debt
messages.content: Many people are struggling with debt. Mike Simpson promotes the availability of confidential help and debt helplines.

messages.title: Hope For Justice
messages.content: Mike Simpson recently met with the Haslemere 'Hope for Justice' group to discuss issues such as human trafficking and Fair Trade.

messages.title: STOP PRESS! HASLEMERE HOSPITAL
messages.content: Worries about the future of Haslemere Hospital have been raised. Mike Simpson will work across party political lines to support the hospital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The first £10,000 you earn would be free of income tax. Mansion tax on homes worth over £2 million.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair start for all our Children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will cut class sizes and phase out university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair and Sustainable economy that creates jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Split up the banks to get lending going again. Create thousands of new jobs through a national program of home insulation.
Introduce a fair voting system and ensure MPs can be recalled by their constituents.

issues.economy: Proposes tackling government debt without choking off economic recovery and splitting up the banks to get lending going again.
issues.education: We will cut class sizes and phase out university tuition fees.
issues.governance: Introduce a fair voting system and ensure MPs can be recalled by their constituents.
issues.health: Many people are struggling with debt, there are debt helplines available. Also concerns about Haslemere Hospital.

housing.content: Create thousands of new jobs through a national program of home insulation.

contactInformation.address: The Liberal Club, South Street, Farnham GU9 7RP

endorsements.endorsement: Discussed the economy and banking crisis with Mike Simpson.

images.caption: Mike Simpson discussing debt issues with Lorley Clark of Christians Against Poverty.
Mike Simpson visiting with local people and groups.
Mike Simpson with the Haslemere 'Hope for Justice' group.
